name: Wardens Rising
storyline:
The discovery of Synthesis changed the fate of humanity, and the universe forever. Its extraordinary power enabled unprecedented control over all matter and energy, while unveiling and releasing supernatural forces.

Humanity learned to harness the power of its cores, fueling their resurgence from the brink of extinction. After years of peace and prosperity inter-dimensional rifts appeared across the realm, revealing a new existential threat.

Dangerous beings came through the rifts, unrelenting in their pursuit of Synthesis, and began invading the Cores. To prevent catastrophe, an elite fighting force called WARDENS was assembled, each member possessing extraordinary talents and the ability to control Synthesis.

With the fate of humanity at stake, the Wardens must Rise to destroy all invaders, close the rifts and return peace to our realm.
summary: A Coop PvE Action Hero Shooter with MOBA-like base defense elements. Protect cores from massive enemy invasions by using abilities, a custom tech-loadout and building defense towers.
